title: Letters {Edward Mayo}
html:
Letters {Edward Mayo}

Here is a blend for VERBATIM: An acquaintance, in his eagerness to describe a home he had visited, called the house palacious, a portmanteau of palatial and spacious, although he was not conscious of his accomplishment until it was pointed out to him. Edward Mayo, Kennebunkport, Maine

[For more on blends and portmanteaus (portmanteaux?) see John Algeo's article in this issue. —Ed.]
